channel.title: Daemonx
channel.description: [ul][size=18pt]Daemonx 317 || Looking for a team[/size] We have this at my flat: [list] [li]Dedicated Server[/li] [li]T1 Line (We traded cable and home phone for epic internet, seemed like a fair trade since we torrent urvrehthing for the most part)[/li] [li]VBulletin until 2012[/li] [li]IPB until 2012[/li] [li]Webserver Hosting[/li] [li]IRC Server with a few channels[/li] [/list] Only thing we need is a good team to help get this server going. We've been working so long on sources it's not even funny. We've released many sources, tuts, snippets, but we haven't really had any servers take off. [hr] [size=14pt]Ideal Staff for the setup we have[/size] [hr] [b]2 Owners[/b] (Myself and a co own thats dedicated and knowledgeable/active) [b]3 Admins[/b] (2 Server, 1 Forum) [b]5 Moderators[/b] (3 Server, 2 Forum) [b]3 Writers[/b] (Who would have lifetime membership privileges in exchange for writing articles for us) [b]3 Artists[/b] (In exchange for membership, submit art, ads, banners, sigs, client images) [hr] [center][img]http://0320063.netsolhost.com/mportal/images/banners/08.jpg[/img] [size=18pt]Basically...[/size] With 16 active players from the start, all considered to be staff, with the motive to advertise the server, it could really take off. Overall, I'm not lazy, I've worked very hard but haven't had a good team that works as hard as I do. I'm not some 13 year old kid who wants to make a server but doesn't have the patience. I'm 20 years old, have been at this since middle school, and trying to cram my social life, "soccer" (futbol), work, an on again off again girlfriend/fiance relationship, and a server/website/forum/photoshop/java/c++ management, not to mention the hectic holiday season, all into one is a little too much for me to bear (basically) alone. [img]http://0320063.netsolhost.com/mportal/images/banners/hire2.png[/img] [hr] [size=14pt]Community Goals[/size] [hr] [list] [li]Build an active community of gamers.[/li] [li]Create a dynamic web portal that caters to all the interests of that community.[/li] [li]Create an active forum that deals in the development and upkeep of all mmo servers, mmo guilds, general gaming discussion, and our servers.[/li] [li]Take on enough staff members, developers, writers, artists, and players get to branded and sponsored.[/li] [li]Advertise our 562 server to the point where we have 1000+ active members, a large staff community, and continue to expand.[/li] [/list] [hr] Bool story cro ik but if you read the entirety then kudos. [center][size=36pt]Server Features[/size][/center] [img]http://0320063.netsolhost.com/562Screens/Capture_23.png[/img] [img]http://0320063.netsolhost.com/562Screens/Capture_26.png[/img] [img]http://0320063.netsolhost.com/562Screens/Capture_27.png[/img] [img]http://0320063.netsolhost.com/562Screens/Capture_29.png[/img] [img]http://0320063.netsolhost.com/562Screens/Capture_31.png[/img] [img]http://0320063.netsolhost.com/562Screens/Capture_41.png[/img] [img]http://0320063.netsolhost.com/562Screens/Capture_42.png[/img] [size=14pt][b]I'll add more pics once I add more to the server.[/b][/size][/ul]

item.description:
@morningstar113 wrote:

@jules: I’ll get on MSN in a bit. I’m actually in need of someone to help me with home locations and shop locations. Since for the time being we’re only doing a stable 317 server. I hate changing my mind again but it seems as if people really just want to play 317’s. Plus I made a webclient for it already which makes it that much easier for people to play.
@SunSpec: PM me your msn and I’ll pm you when I’m on.

item.title: Daemonx
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

[quote=“morningstar113, post:11, topic:370453”]@Sanskrit: Lol Mickey is busy with school apparently. If jew want help with this server feel free. It’s basically the same as a 317, just more folders.
@Phaze One: I bought the vB license. One of my roommates bought the IPB. And I took out the 317 part, since I’m sticking with 562 officially.
@All else: Thanks for support and whatnot. And I’m updating with pics after I post this so feel free to tell meh hwat you think.[/quote]

Lol Mickey volunteers to help and whatnot then he just disappears, that’ s what I expected to happen. I haven’ t been very active on your forums lately because I recently got into Simba scripting. Anyways, just hit me up if you need help, I will help to the best of my ability ;D

Btw, I would love to know what Mickey’ s name is on these forums, he said I would jizz if I knew who he was. I bet he’ s LYING.

Read full topic

item.title: Daemonx
item.dc:creator: @morningstar113 morningstar113
item.description:
@morningstar113 wrote:

[ul][size=18pt]Daemonx 317 || Looking for a team[/size]
We have this at my flat:
[list]
[li]Dedicated Server[/li]
[li]T1 Line (We traded cable and home phone for epic internet, seemed like a fair trade since we torrent urvrehthing for the most part)[/li]
[li]VBulletin until 2012[/li]
[li]IPB until 2012[/li]
[li]Webserver Hosting[/li]
[li]IRC Server with a few channels[/li]
[/list]
Only thing we need is a good team to help get this server going. We’ve been working so long on sources it’s not even funny. We’ve released many sources, tuts, snippets, but we haven’t really had any servers take off.
[hr]
[size=14pt]Ideal Staff for the setup we have[/size]
[hr]
2 Owners (Myself and a co own thats dedicated and knowledgeable/active)
3 Admins (2 Server, 1 Forum)
5 Moderators (3 Server, 2 Forum)
3 Writers (Who would have lifetime membership privileges in exchange for writing articles for us)
3 Artists (In exchange for membership, submit art, ads, banners, sigs, client images)
[hr]
[center]
[size=18pt]Basically…[/size]
With 16 active players from the start, all considered to be staff, with the motive to advertise the server, it could really take off. Overall, I’m not lazy, I’ve worked very hard but haven’t had a good team that works as hard as I do. I’m not some 13 year old kid who wants to make a server but doesn’t have the patience. I’m 20 years old, have been at this since middle school, and trying to cram my social life, “soccer” (futbol), work, an on again off again girlfriend/fiance relationship, and a server/website/forum/photoshop/java/c++ management, not to mention the hectic holiday season, all into one is a little too much for me to bear (basically) alone.

[hr]
[size=14pt]Community Goals[/size]
[hr]
[list]
[li]Build an active community of gamers.[/li]
[li]Create a dynamic web portal that caters to all the interests of that community.[/li]
[li]Create an active forum that deals in the development and upkeep of all mmo servers, mmo guilds, general gaming discussion, and our servers.[/li]
[li]Take on enough staff members, developers, writers, artists, and players get to branded and sponsored.[/li]
[li]Advertise our 562 server to the point where we have 1000+ active members, a large staff community, and continue to expand.[/li]
[/list]
[hr]
Bool story cro ik but if you read the entirety then kudos.
[center][size=36pt]Server Features[/size][/center]







[size=14pt]I’ll add more pics once I add more to the server.[/size][/ul]

Read full topic
